content.rendered:
Canadian Chopin Festival

As part of its mission to celebrate the legacy of Fryderyk Chopin, The Canadian Chopin Society is committed to presenting the Canadian Chopin Piano Competition and Festival every five years.

The Fifth Canadian Chopin Piano Competition and Festival will be held from August 23-29, 2019.
